result.eng: My wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ga: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.orig: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.html: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ponchtml: Tá mo ḃean ag coinneáil go maiṫ an baḃta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.

result.eng: I am keeping going, Páidín. What about yourself?
result.ga: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeacht a Pháidín Céard fútsa
result.orig: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeacht a Pháidín Céard fútsa
result.html: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeacht a Pháidín Céard fútsaI am keeping going, Páidín. What about yourself?
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeaċt a Ṗáidín Céard fútsaI am keeping going, Páidín. What about yourself?

result.eng: The spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.
result.ga: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó Mheiriceá
result.orig: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó Mheiriceá
result.html: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó MheiriceáThe spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a ċoinneáil ar luċt gnó ṀeiriceáThe spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé air a ċuid smugaċán díṁúinte a ċoinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
